price: ߍ߲߬ߍ߲߫ ߸ ߒ ߧߋ߫ ߒ ߞߊ߬ߟߌ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߕߟߋ߬ߓߐ ߟߎ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߕߟߋ߬ߓߋ ߟߎ߫ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߟߊ߫ ߒ ߞߏ߫ ߊ߬ ߛߋ߫ ߦߋ߫ ߒ߬ߠߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߝߋߎ߫
arabic: فَلَآ أُقۡسِمُ بِرَبِّ ٱلۡمَشَٰرِقِ وَٱلۡمَغَٰرِبِ إِنَّا لَقَٰدِرُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: falā uq'simu birabbi al-mashāriqi wal-maghāribi innā laqādirūna
